Description: Dull copper-brown chunks with streaks of gold, exuding a faint metallic tang.
Jagged, dark gray rocks with a subtle sheen of silver under the light.
Charcoal-black minerals that shimmer faintly as though capturing shadows.
Iridescent stones with swirling, otherworldly hues trapped within.
Hard emerald-green fragments, tough enough to scratch steel.
Ancient stones embedded with faintly glowing runic carvings.
Deep void-black rocks, reflecting no light yet pulsating with faint energy.
Bluish-silver stones with a crystalline structure that hums softly.
Twisted metallic shards radiating an unsettling violet glow.
Pure white ore speckled with golden veins, emitting a serene aura.
Dark blue minerals with an inky texture, as if forged in the deep sea.
Frosted silver-blue stones, cold to the touch with a glacial shimmer.
Muted twilight-colored stones with speckles of purple and amber.
Ash-gray rocks that crumble slightly upon contact, leaving a fine dust.
Molten black ores with fiery cracks resembling lava flows.
Clear, frosted shards that refract light into icy rainbows.
Bright red-orange fragments that radiate gentle warmth.
Frozen slime encasing bright, glacial-blue crystals.
Shimmering red gems with internal fiery reflections, hard as diamonds.
Deep purple, jagged crystals with a faint electric hum.
Pale blue-green crystals with swirling mist locked within.
Pristine azure crystals encased in a thin layer of ice.
Brownish-green stones with mossy textures clinging to the surface.
Golden-red crystals that emit a faint, crackling energy.
Slime-coated fragments glimmering with iridescent hues.
Cracked, fiery-red shards that ooze glowing magma.
Translucent globes pulsating with a soft, bioluminescent glow.
Plain, twisted fibers with a coarse, natural texture.
Soft, fluffy bundles in pale cream tones, warm to the touch.
Simple, weathered planks of timber with rough bark edges.
Synthetic fibers with a glossy white finish, flexible yet tough.
Smooth, silvery threads, nearly unbreakable and silky to touch.
Fibers shimmering with multicolored light, as if made of spun rainbows.
